apps.name: Spotify++
apps.description: Spotify++ is a tweaked version of Spotify with premium features unlocked, including unlimited skips and no ads.
apps.whatsNew: Fixed crashes on iOS 14 and above. Added support for high-quality audio streaming.

apps.name: BHTikTok
apps.description: BHTikTok is a modified version of TikTok with premium and region-unlocking features.
apps.whatsNew: Improved region-unlocking feature, now supports more countries. Fixed playback issues with certain videos.

apps.name: YouTube++
apps.description: YouTube++ is a tweaked version of YouTube with features like background playback, ad-blocking, and video downloads.
apps.whatsNew: Added support for higher-quality downloads. Improved stability on iOS 15 and above.

apps.name: Minecraft
apps.description: Minecraft is a sandbox game with unlimited building and exploration possibilities. This version includes modded features.
apps.whatsNew: Added new skins, custom maps, and expanded server support.
